short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome extention to generate the QR code of the currently tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Extension will give you the QR code of the current tab.

This will help you to get the link into any other device quickly.

It is a very light weight extension. Doesn't run in background. Generates QR on the fly when required.
Scales the size of the QR based on the length of the url. 

Feel free to comment the updates or issues.
